snippet: The host of an election night party in Quebec, where a gunman killed one person and wounded another, said that the police ignored his warnings about security deficiencies at the event.
abstract: Yves Desgagnes, host of election night victory party for premier-designate Pauline Marois, where gunman Richard H Bain killed one person and wounded another, calls for independent inquiry into the security policies of Surete du Quebec, provincial force that is responsible for protecting politicians; Desgagnes says force ignored his warnings about security deficiencies at event.
lead_paragraph: The host of an election night party in Quebec, where a gunman killed one person and wounded another, said that the police ignored his warnings about security deficiencies at the event.

headline.main: Man Says He Questioned Safety Before Quebec Shooting
headline.print_headline: Man Says He Questioned Safety Before Quebec Shooting
